item.title: How I'm able to take notes with LaTeX in math class
item.description: For a very long time, I have been trying to create the perfect setup for note taking in general (but more specifically, for math). Before, I used to use notion to take my notes, which was okay, but I wanted something much more productive. And thus, my system was BORN! Here is how some of my notes look like (I am still working on getting the pictures for this. Until then, you can wait ðŸ˜¢):
